byline: Stacey Vanek Smith and Nancy Marshall-Genzer
teaser: Apple goes to federal court today for a case that may shock the publishing world. The U.S. Department of Justice is charging the company conspired with book publishers to fix the prices of e-books. And, got password problems? The company Motorola is reportedly working on a password pill. You'd swallow it, and a tiny piece of ingested tech would transmit your unique signal to devices outside the body.
description: Apple goes to federal court today for a case that may shock the publishing world. title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, June 3, 2013
